headline: DMC Global (BOOM) Surges 12.4%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: DMC Global (BOOM) was a big mover last session on higher-than-average trading volume. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions might not help the stock continue moving higher in the near term.
